com.xhive.util.interfaces
Interface XhiveCSVFileLoaderIf

All Superinterfaces:
XhiveExternalDataLoaderIf
public interface XhiveCSVFileLoaderIf
extends XhiveExternalDataLoaderIf

Loads data from a character separated file. A first row with headernames is assumed. Call setHeadersIncl(false) otherwise

An instance of this interface can be acquired through com.xhive.XhiveDriverFactory.getDriver().getCSVFileLoader(String fileName)

(c) X-Hive Corporation B.V. (www.x-hive.com)
